operations.summary: Rate an object (video, lyrics or music).

parameters.name: objectType
parameters.description: The type of object that will be rated (video, lyrics or music).

parameters.name: objectID
parameters.description: The ID of the object for which the average rating will be calculated.

parameters.name: IP
parameters.description: IP of the machine from which the vote was initiated.

parameters.name: rating
parameters.description: The rating (either -1, 0 or 1) where -1 means a negative rating, 0 means neutral or no rating and 1 means positive rating.

responseMessages.message: The vote could not be saved.

operations.summary: Get the average rating of an object (video, lyrics or music).

parameters.name: objectType
parameters.description: The type of object for which the average rating will be returned.

parameters.name: objectID
parameters.description: The ID of the object for which the average rating will be returned. If no ID is specified, it will return a list of all objects of the specified type with its average rating.

responseMessages.message: A response containing a list containing objects with fields objectID (the ID of the object) and avgRating (the average rating).
The rating could not be fetched.

operations.notes: The average rating consists of a number where -1 means negative, 1 means positive, 0 means neutral and everything in between is also possible.
